Package RateLimiter

Class TestThrottle

java.lang.Object
RateLimiter.Throttle
RateLimiter.TestThrottle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public final class TestThrottle
extends Throttle
This class is for demo and testing purposes, this class extends Throttle class and it takes necessary action based on if a request has exceeded the limit or not.
